data.title: Constance Anastasia (Connie) Yetman â€“ Carnell's Funeral Home, Providing caring, compassionate and courteous services since 1804
data.text:
It is with heavy hearts that we say goodbye to our loving Mother, Grandmother, Wife, Niece and Friend, Constance Anastasia (Connie) Yetman, on May 20, 2020, at the age of 59. Predeceased by Her Mother Alice (Young) and her Father Ed. Leaving to mourn her beautiful daughter and Best Friend, Becky (Raymond Woodfine); her Pride and Joy, her Grandson Joshua (Sydney Taylor-McGrath); her husband Robert (Bob) Butler; her Uncle Harry and Aunt Mary Yetman; her Aunt Joan Clarke; and Aunt Shirley Tulk And uncle Fred Tulk and Aunt Mary Yetman. Connie also leaves to mourn a large extended family and group of friends on Shea Heights, Bell Island and beyond; too many to mention individually, but know she loved you all. Special thanks to Kearney Druken who was there with Mom at the end; we will be forever grateful for all you did to help keep her with us.

Connie had a big heart, and always celebrated life devoting time to her family and friends, throughout good times but also in the hardships. She was there for all that knew her and she will be missed more than words could ever say.

A funeral mass will be held for the family on Friday, October 9th, 2020 at 10:30 a.m. from St. John Bosco and is by invitation only. Interment will follow at Holy Sepulchre Cemetery.
